sections.heading: Licenses to sell tickets or shares; fee; conditions; definitions5-562
sections.text: Licenses to sell tickets or shares; fee; conditions; definitionsA. A license as an agent to sell lottery tickets or shares shall not be issued to any person to engage in business exclusively as a lottery sales agent. Before issuin
